title: NetworkAnalyzer
description: A high-performance C++ application designed to intercept and analyze real-time traffic within a local network.

title: MeasuresApp
description: Fullstack SpringBoot system that processes telemetry from Arduino devices, managing persistent data storage in a database.

title: React Learning Lab
description: A comprehensive collection of exercises and class notes covering React fundamentals, hooks, and component architecture.

title: Minimalist Portfolio
description: The project you are seeing now: A modern, high-performance portfolio built with Astro and Tailwind CSS.

description: A dedicated workspace for mastering utility-first CSS, featuring a variety of layout challenges, responsive designs, and custom styling exercises.

title: Angular Learning Lab
description: An educational repository containing structured exercises and projects focused on Angular architecture.
